goal: 编写一个显示当前日期和时间的Python程序

rules.name: determine_date_time_requirements
rules.condition: IF the task is to display current date and time in Python
rules.action: THEN analyze whether the output needs formatting (e.g., specific date/time format) and if timezone handling is required
rules.expected_outcome: Clear understanding of date/time display requirements

rules.name: implement_datetime_display
rules.condition: IF the basic requirements are understood (no special formatting needed)
rules.action: THEN write Python code using datetime module to display current date and time in default format
rules.expected_outcome: Working Python code that prints current date and time

rules.name: verify_datetime_output
rules.condition: IF Python code for datetime display has been generated
rules.action: THEN execute the code and verify the output matches the system's current date and time
rules.expected_outcome: Confirmed correct date/time display matching system clock
